articles.title: Gilbert Burns says Conor McGregor has no business at welterweight: ‘We’d just destroy Conor’ - MMA Fighting
articles.description: Gilbert Burns says Conor McGregor should stay in his lane and compete at lightweight or even featherweight because fighting at 170 pounds is just going to get him hurt.
articles.content:
Conor McGregor has been teasing his return to the UFC as a welterweight but at least one top ranked fighter at 170 pounds cautions him against that move.
